attributes.action: Recommend Her Majesty The Queen dissolve parliament and take personal control.
attributes.additional_details: Precedent was set in 1681 when King Charles II dissolved Parliament to govern alone.
attributes.background: Parliament has proved itself incapable of governing and so we motion that the Prime Minister recommend Her Majesty The Queen dissolves Parliament and governs alone to resolve the Brexit negotiations and ensure the UK leaves the EU as instructed by the British people.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it's not clear what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

Under the Fixed Terms Parliament Act 2011 the Queen cannot dissolve Parliament.

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/237487
